name: nytimes
text:
The effects of Lebanon's economic meltdown are increasingly infiltrating daily life in the country. Power cuts darken streets, banks refuse to hand over depositors’ cash and families struggle to buy imported essentials like diapers and laundry detergent.
https://t.co/z3MIlaPVRN

text: Oil and gas companies are hurtling toward bankruptcy, raising fears of a potential environmental disaster as unprofitable wells could be abandoned or left untended, even as they continue leaking planet-warming pollutants https://t.co/hSyQyLWOms
